content.description: This is the single pocket face of the cube. One hand in the pocket and another in the crack on the top face. One foot in the middle pocket and the other flagged out helps at the start. Throw the left hand up to catch the pocket on the top face and landing a heel hook in the pocket helps with topping off. Cube is kinda slippery, not the greatest grips. Bonus: The cube moves if you spin it.
content.protection: A mat would be great, it is cement below. But spotting could be sufficient.
content.location: Westfield Mall, on the sidewalk near the Dave and Busters

content.description:
There is a cube feature that is located near Xsport Fitness and the Dave and Busters. There are a bunch of different features and cracks on the cube. V2-V7 range. 

 The cube an be rotated, and top out on top of cube for finishes.
